Hotstar

Brief

Dive into the world of endless entertainment with Hotstar, your one-stop destination for live cricket, blockbuster movies, top Indian TV serials, exclusive Hotstar Specials, and live news. Available anytime, anywhere, experience a whole spectrum of content catering to diverse preferences, all at your fingertips.
